column4: ok, i just install ubuntu server on an old desktop in my closet, i have ssh and samba working and im looking to get ampache working...

can anyone help with the commands to create directories for samba to share and ampache to pull music from? and how do i create users in samba so i can access those shares and get music in there... i also need to get the ampache config file into its place
the samba-doc package has books on using samba. :) to make a samba user ' sudo smbpasswd -a USERNAME '
no idea on the ampache bit
